Series IV. Office of the 3-School Director
Subseries IV.D Office of the Director - Wagner through Tofel
Subseries IV.D Office of the Director - Wagner through Tofel

Materials created by and during the tenure of directors Victoria Wagner, Daniel Wagner, Nathan Brown, Jerome Aron and interim director Carol Tofel. Types of materials include ephemera, correspondence, publications, reports, and meeting materials.
